go_data.justification: The ALG10 locus encodes the alpha-1,2 glucosyltransferase of the endoplasmic reticulum.
The ALG10 locus encodes the alpha-1,2 glucosyltransferase of the endoplasmic reticulum.
The terminal glucose of the lipid-linked oligosaccharide is required for efficient N-linked glycosylation.
